sentences.sContent: Wants, or desires, are things we would like to have but they do not sustain us.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wants, or desires, are things we would like to have but they do not sustain us.
sentences.sCn: 想法或愿望，是我们想要拥有的东西但是他们不能维持我们的生活。

sentences.sContent: ...The problem is that such an impulse is hard to sustain Across the country...
...Lisa Lahey, who coaches executives how to sustain behavior change...
...none of the institutions believe they can sustain the risks of trying to break away by themselves...

synos.tran: 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实

remMethod.val: sus ＋ tain(保持) → 保持； 供养

words.tran: 可以忍受的；足可支撑的；养得起的
持续的；持久的；持久不变的
持续性；永续性；能维持性
支持者，维持者；主发动机；支撑的人物
维持（sustain的过去式和过去分词）；承受
